      • loginByPhone

        @RequestLimit(amount=5,
              time=180)
 @PostMapping(value="/login/phone")
public ResponseBean<LoginInfoVo> loginByPhone(@RequestBody @Validated
                                                                                                                                     PhoneLoginUserDto phoneLoginUserDto)
                                                                                                                              throws java.lang.Exception
        通过账号密码登录
        参数:
        phoneLoginUserDto - 包含账号密码的实体，从请求Json中获取
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception

 @PostMapping(value="/register/phone")

      • bindPhone

        @RequestLimit(amount=1)
 @PostMapping(value="/bind/phone")
public ResponseBean<java.lang.Object> bindPhone(@RequestBody @Validated
                                                                                                             PhoneBindDto phoneBindDto)
                                                                                                      throws MessageCheckException,
                                                                                                             AuthorizationException

      • changePassword

        @RequestLimit(amount=1)
 @PostMapping(value="/changePassword/phone/{phone}")
public ResponseBean<java.lang.Object> changePassword(@RequestBody @Validated
                                                                                                                                    PhoneChangePasswordDto phoneChangePasswordDto,
                                                                                                                                    @PathVariable(value="phone")
                                                                                                                                    java.lang.String phone)
                                                                                                                             throws MessageCheckException,
                                                                                                                                    AccountNotFoundException
        修改密码
        参数:
        phoneChangePasswordDto - 存放修改密码相关信息的实体类
        phone - 手机号
        抛出:
        MessageCheckException
        AccountNotFoundException

 @PostMapping(value="/sign/notice")

        @RequestLimit(amount=1,
              time=180)
 @PostMapping(value="/sign/contract")

                                                                                                                                            @Validated

                                                                                                                                     throws java.io.IOException,
